question_text:
Question 54

GATE 2021
 [Forenoon Session]
Mechanical Engineering
PAGE
44

Consider a single machine workstation to which jobs arrive according to a Poisson distribution with a 
mean arrival rate of 12 jobs/hour. The process time of the work station is exponentially distributed 
with a mean of 4 minutes. The expected number of jobs at the work station at any given point of time 
is_______ (round off to the nearest integer).
Industrial Engineering  
Ans. 
4
